entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches late in the afternoon.
